dialogue_turns.speaker: Walter
dialogue_turns.text: A Nordwind Airlines Boeing 777 had to make an emergency landing in Aktobe today.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A Nordwind Airlines Boeing seven hundred seventy seven had to make an emergency landing in Aktobe today.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A Nordwind Airlines Boeing 777 en route from Yekaterinburg to Sochi made an emergency landing in Aktobe after a female passenger's health deteriorated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Maya
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, that was the flight from Yekaterinburg to Sochi—a passenger's health took a turn mid-air.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, that was the flight from Yekaterinburg to Sochi-a passenger's health took a turn mid-air.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A Nordwind Airlines Boeing 777 en route from Yekaterinburg to Sochi made an emergency landing in Aktobe after a female passenger's health deteriorated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Walter
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's just… really tragic. The woman actually passed away before they could even land.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's just... really tragic. The woman actually passed away before they could even land.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The woman, born in 1983, died before the aircraft landed in Aktobe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Maya
dialogue_turns.text: That's awful. And she was traveling with her husband and kids, right? I can't imagine what they're going through.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's awful. And she was traveling with her husband and kids, right? I can't imagine what they're going through.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The woman, who was traveling to Sochi with her husband and children, died before landing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Walter
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Her body is still in Aktobe, but her family's whereabouts haven't been confirmed yet. No official statements from the airline either.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Her body is still in Aktobe, but her family's whereabouts haven't been confirmed yet. No official statements from the airline either.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Her body remains in Aktobe, while the whereabouts of her family have not been confirmed. No official comments have yet been made by the airline or medical authorities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Maya
dialogue_turns.text: It says the flight did eventually continue on to Sochi around 2:30 in the afternoon, local time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It says the flight did eventually continue on to Sochi around two thirty in the afternoon, local time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Yekaterinburg"Sochi flight resumed its route at approximately 2:30 p.m. Aktobe time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Walter
dialogue_turns.text: And this isn't the first time something like this has happened in Aktobe, either—there was another incident back on May 27th, also a Nordwind flight.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this isn't the first time something like this has happened in Aktobe, either-there was another incident back on May twenty seventh, also a Nordwind flight.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, on May 27, a Nordwind Airlines Boeing 777 carrying 564 passengers was forced to land in Aktobe after a passenger suffered sudden cardiac arrest.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Maya
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, you're right—another passenger, cardiac arrest, also passed before landing. That's two similar tragedies in just over a month.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, you're right-another passenger, cardiac arrest, also passed before landing. That's two similar tragedies in just over a month.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It was later confirmed that the 42-year-old woman died before landing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Walter
dialogue_turns.text: Really makes you think about how stressful air travel can be on the body, especially for people with underlying conditions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Really makes you think about how stressful air travel can be on the body, especially for people with underlying conditions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Maya
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. The airport did say emergency services were dispatched immediately though, and they offered condolences to the family.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. The airport did say emergency services were dispatched immediately though, and they offered condolences to the family.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The airport's press service confirmed that emergency services and a medical team were promptly dispatched to the aircraft upon landing. Aktobe International Airport extends its sincere condolences to the family and loved ones of the deceased, the statement read.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Walter
dialogue_turns.text: Still, such a heartbreaking situation all around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, such a heartbreaking situation all around.
